text: The Golden Salamander is a 1949 thriller novel by the British writer Victor Canning. ==Film adaptation== In 1949 the novel was adapted into a film Golden Salamander directed by Ronald Neame and starring Trevor Howard, Anouk Aimée, and Herbert Lom.Goble p.69 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1949 British novels Category:British thriller novels Category:Novels set in Tunisia Category:British novels adapted into films Category:Novels by Victor Canning
title: The Golden Salamander
